institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-led youth customized training business operation rules/Article 24 (management of subsidies, etc.)
contents: Article 24 (Management of subsidy funds, etc.) ① The project group must manage the subsidy by setting up a separate accounting account and separate and account for its own income and expenditure., ② The project group must maintain an account that protects depositors and has a high interest rate. Support funds must be managed and operated in a stable and efficient manner, including by opening a fund.
